label: ExchangedDeclaration
comment: A collection of data for a piece of written, printed or electronic matter that is exchanged between two parties as a formal declaration.

datatypeProperties.comment: A textual or coded description, such as a remark or additional information.
The rate of currency exchange in this exchanged declaration.
The trade party acting as an agent for the declarant for this exchanged declaration.
The trade party acting as the declarant for this exchanged declaration.
A code specifying a type of acknowledgement document.
The date, time, date time or other date time value when the items which are a subject of this exchanged declaration enter a jurisdiction, such as the actual date of arrival of a means of transport.
Written, printed or electronic matter that is referenced.
A principal trade party associated with this exchanged declaration.
A code specifying a procedure for this exchanged declaration.
The code specifying a specific circumstance in this exchanged declaration.
A logistics related physical location or place.
The identifier for the version of this exchanged declaration.
